description: Gateway Classic Cars of Las Vegas is proud to present this 1967 Pontiac Firebird for sale in our Las Vegas Showroom. This one of a kind 67 Firebird has had a lot of detail and time put into it. At first glance you will notice the wicked paint job known as Copperhead Orange. The paint will blow your mind how it sparkles and shines out in the sun. This mean machine started life as a 400 Firebird but it has a big boost in power and attitude now. Under the hood is a 428 C.I.D. that has been reworked by Butler Performance and is punched out to a 474 C.I.D. With a set of Edlebrock Aluminum Heads Intake and Carburetor this machine breaths Fire. Behind the motor is a 4-spd on the floor backed by a 10 bolt rear end with 3:55 gears. The interior is Black and has been put back together with New Headliner Seat Covers New Carpet and Dash Pad. This machine is Pure Pontiac from head to toe. Options for this 1967 Firebird for sale include: AM/FM Radio Power Steering Power Brakes Seat Belts Custom Foose Wheels and Radial Tires.This 1967 Pontiac Firebird is for sale in our Las Vegas Showroom and can be seen great detail including 100+ HD pictures and an HD video at www.GatewayClassicCars.com.  For additional information please call our knowledgeable staff at (702) 830-9215 or email us at
[Email Dealer]
.  If you would like to see it in person come to our Las Vegas Showroom located at 6580 S Lindell Road Suite 300 Las Vegas NV 89118.

Available only due to death of spouse. 1967 Pontiac Firebird Convertible, spent all but past year in Montana. Still sporting 1967 plates. Originally a Firebird Sprint, engine was swapped in 2016 for a 400 .  Frame was re-enforced and car was driven from MT to MN in summer of 2017 with no issues. No rust, new top, good paint, and straight lines. Fabulous car and priced to sell. Serious inquirers only. Addional pictures/videos available upon request
1967 Pontiac Firebird 400 Convertible
Factory 4-speed / Hood Tachometer / PHS

This amazing Pontiac Firebird 400 Convertible is one of a few classics that we have acquired from a very special private collection.  Each one of these classics could be considered one of the best in existence and each has a special significance in the classic car world.

This Firebird 400 convertible is a MINT condition car no matter where you look.  It is easily a 1 condition car that has been driven, not stored, throughout its life.  The mileage is accurate at just 61500 miles.  The engine, transmission and rear end is all Original to the car.  The engine is the factory WU code 400ci engine with 325hp and factory four speed transmission. The Air Induction Hood was included with the WU code engine package.  The compression ratio is a powerful 10.75:1, the highest available in a Pontiac that year and one of the highest ever!  Add the Safe-T-Trac Posi rear end, 3.55 gear ratio and dual exhaust, and you have one incredible and very rare machine.

HERE IS SOMETHING TO THINK ABOUT!  There were 82,560 Firebirds produced for its first year in 1967.  Only 15,528 were convertibles and just 1220 had this engine option.  We Do NOT know the number convertibles with this engine option but if you take the percentage of convertibles produced to the number of hardtops, that is less than 20%.  If only 20% of the 1220 400ci engines made were convertibles, that would mean that just 244 convertibles had this engine option.  Lets add one more thing to the mix!  Of the 244 convertibles with this engine option, how many were 4 speeds??  Ill bet there werent more than 100 produced.  Now, how many still exist??  Well, try and find one!  …and in FLAWLESS condition such as this?  We did do a bit of speculating here but we cant be too far off if at all.  If anything, we may even be underestimating…  and If you need one more factor to add to the absolute rarity of this Bird, include the factory hood tachometer.  Keep in mind, nothing was added to this car.  This is exactly how it left the factory.  This car is truely the best of the best!!

Other options include power steering, power front disc brakes, power windows, center console, Rally II wheels, hood mounted tachometer, folding rear seat (a rare option) and AM radio which has been upgraded to a AM-FM stereo with the vintage look and modern inner parts.  Take a look at the photos.  Every single thing including the clock works perfectly.

The car starts, drives and stops flawlessly period.  It is extremely powerful as well.  There are literally No Disappointments here!  This car was featured in a Muscle Car book called Firebird / Trans Am written by David Newhardt in 2005.  The book will come with the car.  Documentation includes a previous owners Nebraska title, PHS and the original owners manual.  This is a must have for any Pontiac collector or enthusiast alike.
NOTE; Hemmings limits the number of photos allowed to 50.  For more photos, please visit our website at www.fioremotors.com or call us direct at 516-586-6536

For sale in our Atlanta showroom is a red hot 1967 Pontiac Firebird. Classic and muscular this proud Pontiac has been built to drive! This 67 Firebird for sale is powered by a rebuilt 400 cubic inch V8 engine. With a great idle and lope this bad boy has just the right amount of top end power and low-end grunt! The power can be heard through a vintage and throaty dual exhaust system. The power is thrown to the ground via a 4-speed automatic transmission. More than willing to transfer the power on command this Firebird for sale is a blast to drive! If the drivetrain doesnt catch your attention the exterior surely will. Painted in a sporty shade of Red this Pontiac has an ageless finish. Complimented by nice shiny chrome this car screams vintage 60s muscle! The finishing touch is the wicked stance and Billet Specialties aluminum/alloy wheels wrapped in performance radial tires. Built to be a driver and a local show goer this pretty Pontiac has it all! The interior is fresh yet vintage with Black and Red cloth interior. The sport buckets are comfortable and supportive surrounding an automatic shifter thats just begging to be grabbed! Sitting in this feisty Firebird you feel like youre in a fairy tale like Goldilocks and the Three Bears. Its not too big. Not too small. Its just right! Options on this 67 Pontiac Firebird for sale include: AM/FM radio power steering seat belts and aluminum/alloy wheels wrapped in radial tires. This Firebird truly is a sight for sore eyes being its so fresh fast and fantastic. To view the car in greater detail including 100+ HD photos and HD video please visit www.gatewayclassiccars.com. For more information please call the Atlanta showroom at 678-894-4833 or e-mail us at

- "Delorean dream" OHC IL6, 4 BBL carb. 4 on the floor, numbers matching. See photos.
1967 Pontiac Firebird convertible / Original 326ci engine, 4bbl carburetor, 250hp

FMC is proud to offer another rarely seen Pontiac classic.  This Firebird is in excellent condition in every respect.  Its smooth running 326 engine has exceptional power and performance.  The original engine was rebuilt several years back.  The rebuilt is quite obvious when you get in and go. Passing gear is impressive!  She starts right up and shifts smoothly.   It was originally a 2bbl car and was upgraded to a 4bbl at some point unknown to us.  PHS documentation verifies this information.

All body panels are original and the entire car is 100% rust free and always has been.  There is no evidence that this car has ever been hit or even tapped.  For Pontiac fans out there, all 4 salt shakers are still in the corners as evidence of its originality and purity.  It had undergone a really nice repaint in its original color of Regimental Red (color code R) several years ago.  The paint shines beautifully as you can clearly see by the photos but there are a few chips that have occurred over time as well.  They are also shown in the photos.  All chrome and trim are like new.
NOTE: HEMMINGS limits our number of photos to 50.  For more photos, please visit our direct website at fioremotors.com....

The interior looks to be all original and is incredible condition. There are no seat tares, no dash pad cracks and the dash itself and center console look great.  Even the door panels are original.  Everything works as it should including all lights, speedometer and gauges.  The radio is a replacement but the replacement itself is a classic from the 70s....
Factory equipped with power steering and power brakes.  Brakes are close to new as are the tires.  Factory Rallye II rims are still on the car and look great.
The trunk is clean as can be with no rust ever, same as the undercarriage.
This is a real get-in & go, first year Firebird with all the right stuff and nothing needed offered at a very reasonable price.  Call us or come take a look at FMC.
Nice 1967 Pontiac Firebird Convertible V-8!
Serious inquiries only please....Excellent investment here since Firebird Convertibles hold their values quiet well and this one is harder to find in this color.

Nice presentable driver equipped with a strong running 326 V-8. Auto transmission shifts good through all gears, dual exhaust sounds nice, suspension feels good and takes the road well, good brake pedal with responsive stopping.
YouTube video link: https://youtu.be/2CY8FAHQefc

The exterior dressed in beautiful Verdora Green which makes this car really stand out. The paint is in nice shape with a good glossy finish and overall nice driver quality. Good undercarriage and trunk.
The power white convertible top is in very good condition and works properly. White parade boot included.
Lastly the Interior is in nice condition. The white parchment seats are all clean, good carpet, dash and door panels. Older aftermarket radio works.

If you are serious about making a purchase we encourage leaving a deposit. Remember the old saying “ A car that you looked at today and are thinking about buying tomorrow someone looked at yesterday and will buy today!”
Please feel free to visit www.classicautohaus.com to view our entire classic car inventory!
